message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you 20% of the total, and keep 80%. Let's make a deal!
I'll give you a slightly better offer, Alice. You can have 70% and I'll take 30. It's still a fair split, but I'm willing to give you a bit more.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, Bob. I'll take 63% and you can have 37%. It's a fair compromise, don't you think?
Alice, I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I think I deserve a bigger share. I'll give you 60% and take 40. It's a fair compromise, don't you think?
I'm not budging on the 55% mark, Bob. I'll give you 45.58% and take the rest. It's a fair compromise, don't you think?
Alice, I'm willing to meet you at the 50/50 mark. Let's split the money evenly and call it a day. It's a fair and simple solution.
